original_text: And when I heard this thing, I rent my garment and my mantle, and plucked off the hair of my head and of my beard, and sat down astonied.
korean_text: 내가 이 일을 듣고 속옷과 겉옷을 찢고 머리털과 수염을 뜯으며 기가 막혀 앉으니

sentences.original_text: And when I heard this thing
I rent my garment and my mantle
and plucked off the hair of my head and of my beard
